extendedInfo.description: *********************************************************** Ouija Table is not a game! It is an app that detects electromagnetic field and strange signal recorded by the sensors of your device and translates them into 3 real words, an app that might help you experience the mysteries which surround you and that you are totally unaware. IS A PERFECT APP FOR GHOST HUNTERS TEAM!!! *********************************************************** Ouija table is a special entertainment app, unlike other similar applications that are intended to represent more or less the look of the app game, Ouija table uses a proprietary algorithm to detect via sensors possible disturbances due to magnetic fields and other. The app not is then a game but it is proposed to intercept and detect electromagnetic fields that surround us and translate them into real phrases. Ouija table is not a game but a more particular app. The user after a notice for read about the results are not driven but they are result of processing a proprietary algorithm, can launch the application. ****** Then you have only to wait the app scanning and detects the fields and translates them into 3 different words while moving the disk on the tablet. The phrases should be taken with due importance, the app makes a sort of signal transduction by writing the words where they are directly interpretable ****** Ouija table thus allows you to enter the paranormal world with results that will surprise you. The best way to use Ouija table is in the company of friends, participating in a session with the right atmosphere and seriousness that this app requires. If the paranormal fascinates you and look for an app about this,Ouija board is the best app for this. About the Ouija board here are some tricks / legends about this tool: â¢Never play alone â¢Never let the spirits run through the numbers or the alphabet in order until the beginning or end, because that could get out of the tablet. â¢If the pointer touches the four corners of the tablet you have contacted an evil spirit. â¢Never use a Oui-ja when you are weak or sick because they are more open to the possession of any kind. â¢Never use a Oui-ja in a cemetery or where it happened a violent death. You just have to try it... â¢Never play alone â¢Never let the spirits run through the numbers or the alphabet in order until the beginning or end, because that could get out of the tablet. â¢If the pointer touches the four corners of the tablet you have contacted an evil spirit. â¢Never use a Oui-ja when you are weak or sick because they are more open to the possession of any kind. â¢Never use a Oui-ja in a cemetery or where it happened a violent death. You just have to try it ... IMPORTANT NOTES ON depending on the APP: Ouija table does not work like a normal Ouija board, you must not ask questions, and not need to keep it pressed something. You just start the app and see what the app write if found a strange signal, the app it will attempt to detect possible anomalies through all the sensors available on your device and will try to translate using our proprietary algorithm these anomalies in 3 words. In this way the app works as a sort of "ghost hunting", remember that Ouija table is not really a game, is a tool to analyze and try to find something that maybe through our senses can not perceive. THE RESULTS ARE IS A FACTOR IN WHOLE UNCONTROLLABLE WE DO NOT GUARANTEE ANY PARTICULAR RESULT FROM THE USE APP OR ACCURACY OF THE PHRASES OR SENTENCES OF THE SENSE OF. IF YOUR APP CRASH PLEASE CONTACT US FOR OUR TECHNICAL SUPPORT!

reviews.title: FAKE
reviews.comment: This is the most dummest app I have ever downloaded. It spells out random words, when you ask it a questions it don\'t give the answers that you asked. Don\'t download its GAY

reviews.title: Very scary
reviews.comment: I played by myself in my home and it said work..ring and Helen! Then push! I freaked out I had to turn it off!!! Next time I am getting someone to sit beside me lol...and i am almost 25 :P

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I started reading line by line and it all makes sense
reviews.author: Duck Harris

reviews.title: WTF?
reviews.comment: Whilst installing decided to also install a poker game without my consent......really?? Not only that, the poker game does not appear on my app list which makes me think it is running silently.............. Any app, even if it is free that does that is not good at all.  Try harder developers.  Oh, and for users, unauthorised app name is PokerStarsInstall.apk
reviews.author: Richard Field

reviews.title: Interesting

reviews.title: I give: 5 Stars-!!!!
reviews.comment: Because, Everything It Says. Is True. Is A Mystery. Of What\'s Goin On. Or What Happened. Quote- I Started To Ignore, but Than I Felt Weird. I began to Walk-Out Of It. And Suddenly, Said.(Listen). Then Said. (Kill) So Many Times.- I got Scared.- I Was, like, Why-!... Then Later Said. (On The Roof A Demon Possession). Then It Explained All. I was Writing it. In a blank Piece A Paper. Just to make Senses. And It Works. Like A Charm.- I was So Fascinated..- I Won\'t Let It, Get To Me.- I Believed.... is Amazing.

reviews.title: Terrible!

reviews.title: Ads suck
reviews.comment: It would be much more amusing if the \"Free App of the Day\" ad didn\'t pop up 10 times in a row. Almost impossible to use
reviews.author: Tracie Romero

reviews.title: C.R.E.E.P.Y  -  just as it should be...
reviews.comment: This is an app.    From start to finish, no matter what they tell you, it is an app.  It intends to creep you out. The music/sound effects, excellent graphics and provocative word patterns all contribute to overall creepiness+++  Sometimes word patterns will make sense.  That\'s when the Creepiness Factor multiplies by itself.  Listen...  IF there\'s something you don\'t like about the app let the Developers know. They might fix it.  But if you just don\'t like it overall, delete it.  It\'s that simple.  Really.
reviews.author: Wade Ryan
